Post.title: hexogithub
Post._content:
hexogit

## 
---

hexoNode.jsso...

#### Node

[](https://nodejs.org/en/download/)
path

#### Git

[](http://git-scm.com/download/)

#### Hexo

E://hexo
```
    $ cd e://hexo
    $ npm install hexo-cli -g 
    $ hexo init blog
    $ cd blog
    $ npm install
    $ hexo g 
    $ hexo s 
```
http://localhost:4000/
    
** ** ctrl+cok


 1.hexo g(hexo generate) public
 2.hexo s(hexo server) 
 3.hexo d(hexo deploy) (github)
 4.hexo n "new"(hexo new "new") 

## Hexo
---

hexodemonext
[Next](http://theme-next.iissnan.com/)
#### 

1.Next
```
    $ hexo clean
    $ git clone https://github.com/iissnan/hexo-theme-next themes/next
```

2.

_config.ymlthemenext
```
# Extensions
## Plugins: http://hexo.io/plugins/
## Themes: http://hexo.io/themes/
theme: next
```

3.

```
    $ hexo g # 
    $ hexo s # web   
```

#### 

nextapi

1._config.yml
```
# Site 
title:                 //
subtitle:       //
description:   //
author: wenzi                  //
language: zh-Hans              //
timezone:                      //
```
2.,next_config.yml
next
```
# Schemes
# scheme: Muse
scheme: Mist
# scheme: Pisces
```
icoioc

![](http://onifre9rp.bkt.clouddn.com/ico.png)
```
# Put your favicon.ico into `hexo-site/source/` directory.
favicon: images/favicon.ico
```

```
menu:
  home: /
  categories: /categories
  archives: /archives
  about: /about
  tags: /tags

menu_icons:
  enable: false
  #KeyMapsToMenuItemKey: NameOfTheIconFromFontAwesome
  home: home
  about: user
  categories: th
  schedule: calendar
  tags: tags
  archives: archive
  sitemap: sitemap
  commonweal: heartbeat
```

```
social:
  GitHub: https://github.com/wenzi5519

social_icons:
  enable: true
  GitHub: github
```

```
donate: 
  enable: true
  text: Enjoy it ? Donate me !  
  alipay: 
  wechat: 
```
*

## Git
---

gitgit

#### hexo

```
deploy:
  type: git
  repo: https://github.com/wenzi5519/wenzi5519.github.io.git
  branch: master
```

```
$ npm install hexo-deloyer-git --save
$ hexo d
```


#### Git

git
```
$ git config --global user.name "username"
$ git config --global user.email "username@example.com"
```
ssh
```
ls -al ~/.ssh
```
ssh Key,
```
ssh-keygen -t rsa -b 4096 -C "your_email@example.com"
```
ssh-agent
```
$ ssh-agent -s
```
ssh key 
```
$ ssh-add ~/.ssh/id_rsa
```
key
```
clip < ~/.ssh/id_rsa.pub
```
github-->setting-->Personal settings-->ssh key

```
$ ssh -T git@github.com
```
pushgithub
```
$ git add .
$ git commit -m change description
$ git push origin hexo
```
*hexo

**  **

```
$ git pull
```
 hexo g -d 
pushgithub
**  **
hexo
```
$ git clone https://github.com/wenzi5519/wenzi5519.github.io.git
$ cd wenzi5519.github.io
$ npm install hexo
$ npm install hexo-deployer-git --save
```
